沜字的基本解释

沜
pàn
古同“畔”，岸边：“即于湖沜排列舟舸。”

沜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pàn］
［《廣韻》普半切，去换，滂。］
亦作“溿1”。
(1)水边，崖岸。
(2)“泮”的古字。半月形的水池。

沜字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　沜； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页612第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?普半切，音判。水流也。一曰水厓。　又【玉篇】古文泮字。義與詩隰則有泮之泮同。沜，猶漘也。註詳五畫。【唐書·王維傳】輞川有芙蓉沜。

沜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
沜字的起名意思

水边，崖岸；"泮"的古字。半月形的水池。

沜
Basic explanation of words
沜
pàn
Gu Tong "bank", shore: "Arrange boats on the lake."
沜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pàn］
["Guangyun" is cut in half, go for it, punky. ]
Also known as "Pu 1".
(1) Waterside, cliff bank.
(2) The ancient word "Pan". Half-moon-shaped pool.
沜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　沜; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 612 04
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Half cut in general, phonetic judgment. The water flow also. One said the water cliff.　[Jade articles] Ancient Wenpan characters. Righteousness and poems have the same pan and pan.沜, still 漘 also. Note five pictures in detail. [Book of Tang·Wang Wei Biography] There is a lotus flower in Wangchuan.
